sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>true</flush_cache><name>New fixScript_Ati</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord("incident");
gr.addQuery("active","true");
gr.addEncodedQuery("priority=1^category=NULL");
gr.query();
while(gr.next())
{
	gr.setValue('category',3);
	gr.updateMultiple();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>atindra.chakraborty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-18 18:35:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b9c6b301b1cd4108e93fc87cc4bcb92</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New fixScript_Ati</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8b9c6b301b1cd4108e93fc87cc4bcb92</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>atindra.chakraborty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-18 18:54:40</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
